fABBA.digitization

Functions

calculate_group_centers(data, labels)

digitize(pieces[, alpha, sorting, scl, ...])

Greedy 2D clustering of pieces (a Nx2 numpy array), using tolernce alpha and len/inc scaling parameter scl.

inverse_digitize(strings, parameters)

Convert symbolic representation back to compressed representation for reconstruction.

quantize(pieces)

Realign window lengths with integer grid.

symbolsAssign(clusters[, alphabet_set])

Automatically assign symbols to different groups, start with '!'

wcss(data, labels, centers)
